author: kfogel
msg: * www/svn_1.2_releasenotes.html: Use relative paths for the
stylesheets after all.  This reverts a portion of r14798.
Thanks to Max Bowsher for pointing out that validate.sh can download
the stylesheets to make the relative paths work.

author: sussman
msg: * www/svn_1.2_releasenotes.html: a couple of wording clarifications.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/svn_1.2_releasenotes.html: Give all div elements an id and a
title, so individual sections are easy to refer to.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/svn_1.2_releasenotes.html: Rearrange, and reformat to use the
new tigris.org stylesheets.  Refer to the stylesheets via absolute
URLs, to achieve WYGIWYG when editing this page locally.
Thanks to Ben Collins-Sussman and C. Michael Pilato for tips.
